title: Beautiful and Peaceful
review: It beautiful gurudwara at Naini lake and adjacent to Naina devi Temple.  One can visit there and enjoy food streets and shopping outside the gurudwara

title: a religious place
review: situated near nainital ground .. a simple sikh gurudwara .. nothing special about it .. a place to offer prayers

title: Nice experience
review: The Gurudwara offers a nice place to mediatate near the lake. Offers a nice place to remember and pray to God while on a holiday. A welcome change to the tourist scene all around.

title: Nice.
review: Gurudwara is the place which you can find anywhere in the world so as in Nainital nice place to visit near to Nainital Lake.

title: Best place for visit
review: This is a famous gurudwara located on the way to nainital... The place is very well maintained and offers immense peace to the heart... highly recommended

title: Gurudwara overlooking lake
review: A decent sized Gurudwara near Naini lake and Naina Devi temple maintained by Singh Sabha. Nicely built and very clean

title: sikh pilgrim center
review: place of worship of sikhs. very close to Naina devi temple. uniformly worshiped by people who visits devi temple. big structure.

title: The best place in the world is Gurudwara.
review: You go anywhere in the world you will find gurudwara everywhere. same way we went in Nainital where we have experienced that the only place to get peace is Sabha.

title: You will enjoy the peace and tranquility
review: Devotees come to pay respect to Guru Granth Sahibji and get Devine blessings with Karah Prasad. This is very neat and clean and very peaceful.

title: Peace
review: Good peaceful place to visit and spend some time. It is located next to Naina Devi temple and there are some vendors outside where you can do local shopping.

title: Gurudwara next to Naina devi temple
review: It is located next to Naina Devi temple and Tibetian market in close vicinity of the Masjid, Cricket ground and the Church at the Mall road of Nainital.

title: near by the naina devi temple...
review: this gurudwara shri singh sabha was peaceful...and located very close to the naina devi temple and also the beautiful naina lake

title: Felt awesome
review: We visited this Gurudwara sahib and really felt peaceful.  we spent hours and it was really nice to be here.

title: Heavenly place in Nainital
review: Beautifully Constructed Gurudwara near Naini Lake, in the vicinity of Tibetan market and a mosque. Very big parking place nearby. Always a heavenly feeling going to Sikh temple.

title: Very Beautifully Gurudwara
review: It is near Naina Devi Temple and the lake. Very clean and well maintained, photography is not allowed inside the gurudwara

title: Beautiful Gurudwara
review: Beautiful Constructed Gurudwara on the bank of Naini Lake,Neat and clean and awesome view from Gurudwara

title: Next to Naina Devi Temple
review: Gurudwara shri singh sabha is located next to famous Naina Devi Temple and lake. Very peaceful and divine.

title: Sikh temple in Nainital
review: Next to the Hindu temple, there is a SIkh temple. While there is not much to see, it is nice to see Sikh, Hindu,. Moslem and Christian temples so close to each other and no community division over religion.

title: VERY PEACE FULL PLACE
review: This place is so peacefull near nainadevi tempal so beautyful and nice place to visit in way of tibbat market

title: One of the Famous Religious place in Nainital
review: Near by Naina Devi Temple, there is a Gurudwara where one can go and get the blessings too. Like temple, this gurudwara is also near by lake and near the market. Most important, there are rooms and hall in the Gurudwara where tourists can go and stay after very nominal charges. If you are single, you can stay in the hall for just rs. 50.

title: Gurudwara by the Lake
review: By the side of Nanital lake and Naina Devi temple is the Sikh gurudwara which is maintained by Singh Sabha.

title: Waheguru
review: One of the beautiful gurudwara sahib, Surrounded with mountains. Nana devi temple is next to the gurudwara sahib and masjid was also in front of the the big field.

title: Small cozy wheelchair friendly gurdwara
review: The Singh sabha gurudwara (nainital) is just next to the temple or you can say in the boating area and just outside is the Tibetan market that takes place... it's a nice small gurudwara which is wheelchair friendly I just went in my chair did Park it outside as a respect and walked in a few steps with the help of my friend to do darshan...it was really nice to see the gurudwara and the Temple just side by side ...beautiful feeling

title: Calm and beautiful Gurudwara
review: Calm and beautiful Gurudwara near the Naina Devi temple

title: Very Peaceful
review: Nice place. Location is just at the bank of lake. Looks awsome. Must visit place in nainital. it is just beside with temple

title: peace & tranquility with a magnificeient view of Naini lake
review: located very close to Naina devi temple.

title: Peaceful place close to the Nainital Lake
review: The Gurudwara Shri Singh Sabha is located off the Nainital lake close to the Bhotiya market and Naina Devi temple. The place is peaceful and offers a good chance to offer your prayers.

title: good place
review: very calm place...

title: A very peaceful place
review: A very peaceful place to visit. Its amongst the mountains and there is always someone to help you at the gurudwara. Has a parking lot too. However, you have to pay rs. 100 for it.

title: So Peaceful ..
review: A very peaceful place to spent some time with friends. The location is lovely .want to vist this place again

title: Another Gurudwara ..
review: It is always peaceful to visit a Gurudwara.  Visit, sit for a while and listen to those raags .. Good atmosphere ..

title: Must visit place
review: Very serene and beautiful place. Worth visiting and spending some time in a peaceful environment.

title: Peace of mind
review: Its located on bank of the lake.Easy to reach and have a peace of mind. Rooms facility is available at INR 500 only.

title: Peaceful and must visit
review: It is situated just adjacent of Naina devi temple. The gurudwara is clean and very well maintained. People from all religions visit this with same respect. I visited it for first time ( I have been to Nainital before as well). Believe me it has given me inner happiness and satisfaction. I would recommend that one should definitely go there if you are visiting Nainital.

title: Holy Place for Sikh
review: Nice to visit the Gurudwara while its give relaxing and peace of mind, very clean and well managed by the committee.The evening time looks beautiful and pleasant while chanting the gurbani and sweets being distribute by the committee.

title: peaceful
review: one can visit this over their nainital visit , easily accessible on mall road  around naini lake . i liked this place

title: Gurudwara on Naini Lake
review: Gurudwara Shri Guru Singh Sabha is one of the most popular religious place of worship located near the Naina devi temple in Nainital ... just before the Tibetan market. It is very popular among the locals and also among the tourists as there are a sizable number from North India.

title: good
review: built in an open space & very close to naina devi temple. there are many tibetan market shops nearby.

title: Peace in the peaceful city
review: nearby the tibetian market you will find this small but a peaceful gurudwara , it has a temple aside & beautiful lake from the front view. SSA

title: Serene...Good to visit
review: Gurudwara temple is situated on the border of Nainital Lake and Naina Devi temple. It is close to Tibetan Market and Mall road. You may plan the visit in evening and later on you can enjoy strolling in mall road and do window shopping. In the evening if you go you can listen to live bhajans which are sung there. Remember to carry at least a scarf to cover the head as without covering the head the entry is not allowed inside the Gurudwara. Good place to seat and meditate and spend some time in silence in case you are interested in.

title: Nice to hav blessings
review: Just beside Tibetian market and Naina Devi Temple, you can spend some time here for relaxing and enjoying nice ambiance of the place.

title: Good place
review: This is a sikh shrine. Well maintained and very good place near lake. The gurudwara is clean and must be visited .

title: Nice Ambience by Lake Side
review: Gurudwara Shri Singh Sabha of Nainital is situated on the shores of Naini Lake and adjacent to Naina Devi temple. Tourist visiting Naina Devi Temple also make it a point to visit this place and spend some peaceful time in the nice ambience. Blessings of the Almighty, be it at Church, temple or Gurudwara, are always welcome.

title: gurudwara
review: it is always good to visit a gurudwara.  it is near to the naina devi temple and the atmosphere is really calm

title: Peaceful
review: I liked visiting this gurudwara. It was on our way to Naina devi temple. It was peaceful. I sat there for a couple of minutes and enjoyed the peace.

title: Sat Shri Akal
review: The Gurudwara is very neat, clean and peaceful place to be. Situated close to the Naina Devi Temple.

title: Gurudwara @ Nainital
review: Very serene and peaceful. Just beside the naini jheel one of the few Gurudwara's beside a Natural Lake.

title: Peaceful Place
review: The Gurudwara is very clean and peaceful place to be. Situated adjacent to the Naina Devi Temple. One needs to cover the head before entering the gurudwara. Handkerchief to be used as bandanas are already present in a box by the door. Inside the shrine there are approx two rooms open to be visited by tourists. The room within the room gives a heaven-type feeling. All the curtains are white in color and the sunlight coming in gives the place a very warm effect. Photography inside the gurudwara is prohibited.

title: Food for Soul
review: A very peaceful place on the flats in Nainital.

title: must visit place
review: nearby naini temple and a masjid, this gurudwara is a must visit place near naini lake, also various shopping places nearby.
